verses.text: Toorri hidda dhaloota Yesus Kiristos sanyii Daawit, sanyii Abrahaam isa kana.
Abrahaam Yisihaqin dhalche; Yisihaq Yaaqoobin dhalche; Yaaqoob Yihudaa fi obboloota Yihudaa dhalche.
Yihudaan Taamaar irraa Faaresii fi Zaaraa dhalche; Faares Hesromin dhalche; Hesrom Aaramin dhalche.
Aaram Aminaadaabin dhalche; Aminaadaab Nahasoonin dhalche; Nahasoon Salmoonin dhalche.
Salmoon Rahaab irraa Boazin dhalche; Boaz Ruut irraa Yoobeedin dhalche; Yoobeed Iseyin dhalche.
Isey Daawit mooticha dhalche; Daawit haadha manaa Uriiyaa irraa Solomoonin dhalche;
Solomoon Rehobi'aamin dhalche; Rehobi'aam Abiiyaa dhalche; Abiiyaan Asaafin dhalche;
Asaaf Yoshaafaaxin dhalche; Yoshaafaax Yooraamin dhalche; Yooraam Oziyaasin dhalche;
Oziyaas Yo'ataamin dhalche; Yo' ataam Akaazin dhalche; Akaaz Hisqiyaasin dhalche.
Hisqiyaas Minaasee dhalche; Minaaseen Amosin dhalche; Amos Yosiyaasin dhalche.
Yosiyaas bara sabni Israa'el biyya Baabilonitti booji'amanitti Yekoniyaasii fi obboloota Yekoniyaas dhalche.
Sabni Israa'el biyya Baabilonitti erga booji'amanii booddee Yekoniyaas Salaati'elin dhalche; Salaati'el Zarubaabelin dhalche.
Zarubaabel Abiyuudin dhalche; Abiyuud Eliyaaqimin dhalche; Eliyaaqim Azorin dhalche;
Azor Zaadoqin dhalche; Zaadoq Akiimin dhalche; Akiim Eliyudin dhalche.
